service: Alexa for Business makes it easy for you to use Alexa in your organization. Alexa for Business gives you the tools you need for managing Alexa devices, enroll your users, and assign skills, at scale. You can build your own context-aware voice skills using the Alexa Skills Kit and the Alexa for Business API operations. You can make also these available as private skills for your organization. Alexa for Business makes it easy to voice-enable your products and services, providing context-aware voice experiences for your customers.

operations.AssociateContactWithAddressBook: Associates a contact with a given address book.
operations.AssociateDeviceWithRoom: Associates a device with a given room. This applies all the settings from the room profile to the device, and all the skills in any skill groups added to that room. This operation requires the device to be online, or else a manual sync is required.
operations.AssociateSkillGroupWithRoom: Associates a skill group with a given room. This enables all skills in the associated skill group on all devices in the room.
operations.CreateAddressBook: Creates an address book with the specified details.
operations.CreateContact: Creates a contact with the specified details.
operations.CreateProfile: Creates a new room profile with the specified details.
operations.CreateRoom: Creates a room with the specified details.
operations.CreateSkillGroup: Creates a skill group with a specified name and description.
operations.DeleteAddressBook: Deletes an address book by the address book ARN.
operations.DeleteContact: Deletes a contact by the contact ARN.
operations.DeleteProfile: Deletes a room profile by the profile ARN.
operations.DeleteRoom: Deletes a room by the room ARN.
operations.DeleteRoomSkillParameter: Deletes room skill parameter details by room, skill, and parameter key ID.
operations.DeleteSkillGroup: Deletes a skill group by skill group ARN.
operations.DeleteUser: Deletes a specified user by user ARN and enrollment ARN.
operations.DisassociateContactFromAddressBook: Disassociates a contact from a given address book.
operations.DisassociateDeviceFromRoom: Disassociates a device from its current room. The device continues to be connected to the Wi-Fi network and is still registered to the account. The device settings and skills are removed from the room.
operations.DisassociateSkillGroupFromRoom: Disassociates a skill group from a specified room. This disables all skills in the skill group on all devices in the room.
operations.GetAddressBook: Gets address the book details by the address book ARN.
operations.GetContact: Gets the contact details by the contact ARN.
operations.GetDevice: Gets the details of a device by device ARN.
operations.GetProfile: Gets the details of a room profile by profile ARN.
operations.GetRoomSkillParameter: Gets room skill parameter details by room, skill, and parameter key ARN.
operations.GetSkillGroup: Gets skill group details by skill group ARN.
operations.ListDeviceEvents: Lists the Device Event history for up to 30 days. If EventType isn't specified in the request, this returns a list of all device events in reverse chronological order. If EventType is specified, this returns a list of device events for that EventType in reverse chronological order.
operations.ListSkills: Lists all enabled skills in a specific skill group.
operations.ListTags: Lists all tags for a specific resource.
operations.PutRoomSkillParameter: Updates room skill parameter details by room, skill, and parameter key ID. Not all skills have a room skill parameter.
operations.ResolveRoom: Determines the details for the room from which a skill request was invoked. This operation is used by skill developers.
operations.RevokeInvitation: Revokes an invitation and invalidates the enrollment URL.
operations.SearchAddressBooks: Searches address books and lists the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria.
operations.SearchContacts: Searches contacts and lists the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria.
operations.SearchDevices: Searches devices and lists the ones that meet a set of filter criteria.
operations.SearchProfiles: Searches room profiles and lists the ones that meet a set of filter criteria.
operations.SearchRooms: Searches rooms and lists the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria.
operations.SearchSkillGroups: Searches skill groups and lists the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria.
operations.SearchUsers: Searches users and lists the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria.
operations.SendInvitation: Sends an enrollment invitation email with a URL to a user. The URL is valid for 72 hours or until you call this operation again, whichever comes first.
operations.StartDeviceSync: Resets a device and its account to the known default settings, by clearing all information and settings set by previous users.
operations.TagResource: Adds metadata tags to a specified resource.
operations.UntagResource: Removes metadata tags from a specified resource.
operations.UpdateAddressBook: Updates address book details by the address book ARN.
operations.UpdateContact: Updates the contact details by the contact ARN.
operations.UpdateDevice: Updates the device name by device ARN.
operations.UpdateProfile: Updates an existing room profile by room profile ARN.
operations.UpdateSkillGroup: Updates skill group details by skill group ARN.

refs.UpdateProfileRequest$Address: The updated address for the room profile.

refs.GetAddressBookResponse$AddressBook: The details of the requested address book.

refs.SearchAddressBooksResponse$AddressBooks: The address books that meet the specified set of filter criteria, in sort order.

Filter.base: A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by various criteria.

refs.SearchAddressBooksRequest$Filters: The filters to use to list a specified set of address books. The supported filter key is AddressBookName.
refs.SearchContactsRequest$Filters: The filters to use to list a specified set of address books. The supported filter keys are DisplayName, FirstName, LastName, and AddressBookArns.
refs.SearchDevicesRequest$Filters: The filters to use to list a specified set of devices. Supported filter keys are DeviceName, DeviceStatus, DeviceStatusDetailCode, RoomName, DeviceType, DeviceSerialNumber, UnassociatedOnly, and ConnectionStatus (ONLINE and OFFLINE).
refs.SearchProfilesRequest$Filters: The filters to use to list a specified set of room profiles. Supported filter keys are ProfileName and Address. Required.
refs.SearchRoomsRequest$Filters: The filters to use to list a specified set of rooms. The supported filter keys are RoomName and ProfileName.
refs.SearchSkillGroupsRequest$Filters: The filters to use to list a specified set of skill groups. The supported filter key is SkillGroupName.
refs.SearchUsersRequest$Filters: The filters to use for listing a specific set of users. Required. Supported filter keys are UserId, FirstName, LastName, Email, and EnrollmentStatus.

InvalidUserStatusException.base: The attempt to update a user is invalid due to the user's current status. HTTP Status Code: 400

LimitExceededException.base: You are performing an action that would put you beyond your account's limits. HTTP Status Code: 400

refs.RoomSkillParameter$ParameterValue: The parameter value of a room skill parameter.

refs.Sort$Key: The sort key of a sort object.

refs.SearchAddressBooksRequest$SortCriteria: The sort order to use in listing the specified set of address books. The supported sort key is AddressBookName.
refs.SearchContactsRequest$SortCriteria: The sort order to use in listing the specified set of contacts. The supported sort keys are DisplayName, FirstName, and LastName.

refs.SearchProfilesRequest$SortCriteria: The sort order to use in listing the specified set of room profiles. Supported sort keys are ProfileName and Address.
refs.SearchRoomsRequest$SortCriteria: The sort order to use in listing the specified set of rooms. The supported sort keys are RoomName and ProfileName.
refs.SearchSkillGroupsRequest$SortCriteria: The sort order to use in listing the specified set of skill groups. The supported sort key is SkillGroupName.
refs.SearchUsersRequest$SortCriteria: The sort order to use in listing the filtered set of users. Required. Supported sort keys are UserId, FirstName, LastName, Email, and EnrollmentStatus.

refs.Sort$Value: The sort value of a sort object.

Tag.base: A key-value pair that can be associated with a resource.

refs.Tag$Key: The key of a tag. Tag keys are case-sensitive.

refs.ListTagsResponse$Tags: The list of tags requested for the specific resource.
refs.TagResourceRequest$Tags: The tags to be added to the specified resource. Do not provide system tags. Required.

refs.Tag$Value: The value of a tag. Tag values are case-sensitive and can be null.
